steps.title: Peel off the entire banana peel from the banana.
steps.content: Peel off the entire banana peel from the banana. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Take out the banana "string" if you are making baby food.
steps.content: Take out the banana "string" if you are making baby food. It's also helpful to remove or cut off both ends of the banana tips.

steps.title: Use the bottom of a spoon or fork to press down on the banana.
steps.content: Use the bottom of a spoon or fork to press down on the banana. Continue this process until the banana is well mashed. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Peel off the entire banana peel from the banana.
steps.content: Peel off the entire banana peel from the banana.

steps.title: Take out the banana "string" and cut off both ends of the banana tips.
steps.content: Take out the banana "string" and cut off both ends of the banana tips.

steps.title: Slice the banana(s) into small chunks or pieces.
steps.content: Slice the banana(s) into small chunks or pieces. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Place the pieces into a food processor or blender.
steps.content: Place the pieces into a food processor or blender. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Blend or purée mixture until well mixed thoroughly.
steps.content: Blend or purée mixture until well mixed thoroughly. [5] X Research source
